Use this section as a reference for WalkBuddy\'s usage.
This tab is used to record new routes to destinations. It keeps track of your location, timing, and allows you to save the route with a specific destination name and start location.

You can find all your past destinations, along with routes to them, here. If you want to walk a route again, just select it from the list and it will bring it up on the map, along with your location relative to it. Long press a destination or route to get the option to delete it.
Edit your account information in the account tab. This includes changing your name, email, and password. You are also able to sign out here or delete your account entirely.

WalkBuddy is an application for maximizing walking by minimizing time. It allows you to record routes to destinations you frequent, then times and stores those routes so that you can walk them again. By doing this, you are able to track the fastest route to every destination.
